BODY+ Module

Detailed Description

The High level interface to the character body.

This module contains just a single interface IBody together with some useful enum definitions.


Classes

interface  IBody
 BODY+ high level interface to the character body. More...


BODY+ Identifiers for Body Parts

Used to identify a body part in IBody object.

See IBody for details how body parts are identified.

enum  BODY_PART_ID {
  BODY_NULL = 0x000000, BODY_OBJECT = 0x010000, BODY_ROOT = 0x020000, BODY_PELVIS = 0x030000,
  BODY_SPINE = 0x040000, BODY_NECK = 0x050000, BODY_HEAD = 0x060000, BODY_JAW = 0x070000,
  BODY_BEAK = 0x080000, BODY_HORN = 0x090000, BODY_PONYTAIL = 0x0A0000, BODY_CLAVICLE = 0x0B0000,
  BODY_ARM = 0x0C0000, BODY_HAND = 0x0D0000, BODY_FINGER = 0x0E0000, BODY_TAIL = 0x0F0000,
  BODY_HIP = 0x100000, BODY_LEG = 0x110000, BODY_FOOT = 0x120000, BODY_TOE = 0x130000,
  BODY_SPUR = 0x140000, BODY_LAST = 0x150000
}

BODY+ Body Part Identifiers for Left-Right

Used to identify a body part in IBody object.

See IBody for details how body parts are identified.

enum  BODY_PART_LR { BODY_RIGHT = 0x0000, BODY_LEFT = 0x0100 }

BODY+ Body Part Indices - for fingers and toes only

Used to identify a body part in IBody object.

See IBody for details how body parts are identified.

enum  BODY_PART_FINGERTOE {
  BODY_1 = 0x0000, BODY_2 = 0x0200, BODY_3 = 0x0400, BODY_4 = 0x0600,
  BODY_5 = 0x0800, BODY_THUMB = BODY_1, BODY_INDEX = BODY_2, BODY_MIDDLE = BODY_3,
  BODY_RING = BODY_4, BODY_BABY = BODY_5
}

BODY+ Body Part Information Types

Values to be passed to IBody::GetInfo and IBody::GetFInfo functions

enum  BODY_INFO { BODY_INFO_NUMPARTS, BODY_INFO_NUMSEG, BODY_INFO_SEGCAP, BODY_INFO_LENGTH }

BODY+ Body Schemas

Body schema defines the standard in which body parts (or bones) are named.

This value is to be passed to IBody::LoadBody function.

enum  BODY_SCHEME { BODY_SCHEMA_DISCREET, BODY_SCHEMA_ALIAS, BODY_SCHEMA_RESERVED = 99 }

Enumeration Type Documentation

enum BODY_PART_ID
 

Enumeration values:
BODY_NULL  NULL (always).
BODY_OBJECT  Body Root Node.
BODY_ROOT  Body Root Node.
BODY_PELVIS  Pelvis.
BODY_SPINE  Spine.
BODY_NECK  Neck.
BODY_HEAD  Head.
BODY_JAW  Low jaw.
BODY_BEAK  Beak or upper jaw.
BODY_HORN  Horn (something added on top of the head).
BODY_PONYTAIL  Pony tail (something added on top of the head).
BODY_CLAVICLE  Clavicle.
BODY_ARM  Arm (typically 2 links: upper arm & forearm).
BODY_HAND  Hand.
BODY_FINGER  Finger.
BODY_TAIL  Tail.
BODY_HIP  Hip.
BODY_LEG  Leg (typically 2 links: thigh & calf).
BODY_FOOT  Foot.
BODY_TOE  Toe.
BODY_SPUR  Spur (something attached to the foot).
BODY_LAST  end of the body part list

Definition at line 30 of file bodyplus.idl.

enum BODY_PART_LR
 

Enumeration values:
BODY_RIGHT  Right side part.
BODY_LEFT  Left side part.

Definition at line 61 of file bodyplus.idl.

enum BODY_PART_FINGERTOE
 

Enumeration values:
BODY_1  Index (1) - for fingers and toes only.
BODY_2  Index (2) - for fingers and toes only.
BODY_3  Index (3) - for fingers and toes only.
BODY_4  Index (4) - for fingers and toes only.
BODY_5  Index (5) - for fingers and toes only.
BODY_THUMB  Synonym for the thumb.
BODY_INDEX  Synonym for the index finger.
BODY_MIDDLE  Synonym for the middle finger.
BODY_RING  Synonym for the ring finger.
BODY_BABY  Synonym for the baby finger.

Definition at line 72 of file bodyplus.idl.

enum BODY_INFO
 

Enumeration values:
BODY_INFO_NUMPARTS  valid with BODY_FINGER and BODY_TOE only, returns number of fingers/toes
BODY_INFO_NUMSEG  returns number of segments, 0 if body part does not exist
BODY_INFO_SEGCAP  returns maximal number of segments acceptable in the given implementation
BODY_INFO_LENGTH  returns the length of a body part (single segment only)

Definition at line 90 of file bodyplus.idl.

enum BODY_SCHEME
 

Enumeration values:
BODY_SCHEMA_DISCREET  standard hierarchy from Discreet Character Studio bipeds
BODY_SCHEMA_ALIAS  reserved for future Maya-focused extension
BODY_SCHEMA_RESERVED  values until 99 reserved
